DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients biopsyproven adenocarcinoma prostate treat radical prostatectomy Department Urology , University Hospital Zurich Written inform consent Exclusion criterion : Metastatic prostate cancer Contraindications class investigational product study , e.g . know hypersensitivity allergy investigational product Severe heart lung disease Severe liver kidney dysfunction Severe stridor Distant metastases Concurrent treatment malignant disease Prior hormonal therapy radiotherapy
